concept.title: Cascading of metadata elements from map to map
concept.shortdesc: Elements that are contained within topicmeta elements follow the same rules for cascading from map to map as the rules that apply within a single DITA map.

conbody.p: For a complete list of which elements cascade within a map, see the column "" in the topic .
conbody.note: It is possible that a specialization might define metadata that is intended to replace rather than add to metadata in the referenced map, but DITA, by default, does not have a mechanism to specify this behavior.
